participant_1.background:
My weight is not relevant to this question.
i am failing some of my classes.
my name is nancy.
I like a soft bed for my baby.
I grew up in the Midwest where the summers are hot and the watermelon is sweet.

participant_2.background:
I need to move more, and get my beer gut under control.
i am a huge fan of jason mraz.
I had a client cancel her wedding a week before the big day.
I get to make gummy worms all day long, which is a dream come true for me!
I'm not happy with my job or marriage, but I'm trying to make the best of it.

content.text: Hello! I'm Nancy, and I'm from the Midwest. What's your name?
Hi Nancy, my name is Jason. I'm from the Midwest too! I love gummy worms!
That's funny, I love gummy worms too! I wish I could make them all day long like you do!
I'm lucky to have this job. I get to make gummy worms and listen to Jason Mraz all day long.
Oh, that's awesome! I love Jason Mraz too. I was just listening to his song "I'm Yours" the other day.
That's a great song! I love all of his music.
Me too! I'm glad to meet someone else who loves Jason Mraz.
Yeah, me too! It's not often I meet someone who shares my love of gummy worms and Jason Mraz.
Well, now we have something in common!
I'm glad! I hope we can be friends.
Me too! I'd love to be friends with you.
Great! We can talk about Jason Mraz and gummy worms all day long.
